Text: Mourn, reflect, stand firm. Resist.
But the darkness that spreads when we react to such terror by surrendering our humanity via the closing of our minds and hearts.
More clearly:  The darkness is not only about murderers who irredeemably void their humanity via acts of terror
We are all citizens of Paris tonight: Keep Marianne's torch raised high and brightly burning. Resistance to the forces of night.
